name: Mind Ball
description:
Mind Ball Is A Twist On The Rolling Ball Game Genre. Whenever The Camera Rotates The Controls Don't Change. This Game Will Annoy And Confuse You More Than You've Ever Been. To Sum It Up, Imagine Ballance Meeting Getting Over it. That's What Kind Of Game I'm Talking About.

With 11 Levels, 6 Hours of Game play (As Of Now) And A New Level Every Week, You'll Never Run Out Of Fun.

This Game Is Still In Early Access With Some Visual/Gameplay Bugs

Some Known Bugs Are:

  • Frame Rate Drops After Exiting Slow Motion
  • Weird Camera Motion During Some Transitions
  • Shadows Flashing On Moving Surfaces 

If You Discover Any New Bugs Or Generally Have Any Questions, Please Don't Hesitate To Give Feedback.  

Note: The Game Does Have Audio But I Had Problems With The Recording Software I Was Using And Sadly Couldn't Capture Audio
